title: Input
description: This function does the opposite of the compile_signed_transaction_intent function. This function takes in a compiled signed transaction intent and decompiles it into its transaction intent and signatures.

instructions_output_kind.description: Defines the output format that we would like the manifest to be in after this request is performed.

compiled_signed_intent.description: A byte array serialized as a hex string which represents the compiled signed transaction intent to decompile.

InstructionKind.description: An enum which describes the kind of manifest instructions.
